description: before S.Dharmadasa Vs. S.B. Meddekanda-Hon. K.T.Chitrasiri, J-No prerogative writs can be issued to have the terms of a contract implemented without showing that there had been a public duty arising from a statute cast upon the executive
judgement_by: S.Dharmadasa Vs. S.B. Meddekanda-Hon. K.T.Chitrasiri, J-No prerogative writs can be issued to have the terms of a contract implemented without showing that there had been a public duty arising from a statute cast upon the executive
